p: Visual LAMP. To develop an alternative and easy-to-use protocol to detect the A. bungii DNA from collected samples, a visual LAMP approach based on the primers designed for the real-time LAMP assay was also tested. The Bst 3.0 DNA polymerase kit (New England Biolabs Ltd., UK) was used for LAMP reactions on A. bungii DNA from frass with the same six LAMP primers used in the real-time LAMP test. Hydroxynaphthol Blue (HNB) was included in the reaction mixture (Goto et al. 2009) and the color change (from purple to blue) was evaluated at the end of the reaction.
